item.title: Summarize Web Posts with React and Python
item.description: Before the end of the year, I vowed to read all 100+ articles that were in my backlog. I had a lot of catching up to do, but if I spent only 15 minutes reading each article, it would still take all day. What if I run my archive through a summarizer so I could quickly see which articles were more important to read than others? This type of technology is not new and hard to find to free online.
